verbs.description: " [ARG1: President Trump] [V: is] [ARG2: a flash - bang grenade thrown into Washington by the forgotten men and women of America] . "
" President Trump is [ARG1: a flash - bang grenade] [V: thrown] [ARG2: into Washington] [ARG0: by the forgotten men and women of America] . "
